header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Car Accident, Alice in Wonderland, Scars, Music, Costume, the Internet, Presents, Seagulls, Reading, Theatre, Reading

body.u: so what's all this about uncle and his car?
oh yeah well erm you know he normally drives erm to work with they sort of take it in turns and
drive in and everything and they have a very set route well was off the other week and so when uncle was coming back he kind of decided to go cross-country and do a slightly different route
so he was erm coming through sort of and way which is where it's not that far from where auntie lives actually and erm it was getting qui er near to dark it was sort of dusk time you know
so light wasn't brilliant but it was okay and erm he was just coming over the the brow of a hill
when out of the corner of his eye he noticed something coming from the side and it was a deer
it was gonna be a deer
he knew those those deer they get everywhere don't they
in the country? so I mean 's had a few no two encounters with deer
erm both of them have cost luckily not her life but you know
but cost her money cos they did quite a lot of damage cos they
come at really come at speed and the worst thing for uncle was was that you know he was sort of within the speed limit but he was probably at the maximum speed limit at sixty round there
so you know he's just coming over the brow of a hill seen out of the corner of his eye a deer
starting to you know launch itself and just does all he can to stop the car you know without
spinning it like I did on that night coming home
from erm and so he's just braking and braking and just hoping for the best but it hits him hits the car
but it's kind of like he clipped it almost on the on the side of the car

and he's just sort of g after it's happened you know he it's prpronged off somewhere and he's he's carried on slowing down so n he's sort of near the bottom of this hill and he pulls over to get out and have a look and

dust himself down and as he gets out he looks up the hill and he can see that there's another car at the top of the hill that has also stopped and as it turns out what had happened was as he was coming over the brow of the hill to go down another guy was coming up the hill to go over
and when uncle clipped the deer the other car collected it basically
well it hit the other car so the guy there's a guy up the top there waving down to uncle so he kind of had a quick look at the side of his car and it's you know it's mashed up at the side but
it's not you know it's not insurmountable as it were and he goes up to check this guy's okay and everything's alright up there and he goes up and this guy's got cuts to his head and
you know to his arm not not really deep cuts but you know

he's bleeding a bit and everything but he seems pretty compos mentis and erm and you know they were chatting saying oh are you alright are you okay? oh gosh you know uncle sees the front of his car and he definitely came off worse for it
because it's hit the top of the car in the middle
and if you'd have seen a photo I in fact I said to uncle send me the photos cos it's just unbelievable that this guy got out and he was walking and doing anything really
because the whole of the middle of the car is kind of caved in
erm and the windscreen is totally shattered and you know it's like this it

yeah just completely caved in so the the deer's obviously hit the top you know near the windscreen anyway by this time another motorist or a couple of motorists actually I think had stopped and er this guy was sort of yyou know saying to the the other driver you know are you sure you're alright? you know are you sure you don't want an ambulance? and he's like no no I'm fine you know I'm just sort of yeah I I've just got a few cuts but I'm absolutely fine but looking at the car you would never have believed it you know
